Desc.entry: A registered charity providing supported housing for women aged 16-35 with a mild to moderate learning disability. A purpose built intitiative set up and run by Sheffield YWCA which aims to provide the young women with the tools to live independently within the community. Comprises 6 self-contained flats and an on-site office. Support is available during office hours and 24hour telephone support is available outside these times. A referral form is available on the website (follow the links for Peile Court Project then Peile Court referral service).

category.entry: LEARNING DISABILITIES - ORGANISATIONS FOR PEOPLE WITH
